alert.note: Alert for Bureau; Putnam; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 9:29AM CDT until November 05 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PUTNAM...EASTERN WHITESIDE AND CENTRAL BUREAU COUNTIES... At 928 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lyndon to New Bedford to Providence, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Princeton, Henry, Prophetstown, Walnut, Wyanet, Tiskilwa, Tampico, Lyndon, Buda, Bureau Junction, Deer Grove, Putnam, Round Grove, Manlius, Milo, New Bedford, Malvern, Como, Agnew and Providence. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
